key_risks: Labor shortages and operational costs due to driver shortages and labor disputes
Regulatory compliance and legal risks from ongoing disputes and emissions regulations
Economic sensitivity and competitive pressures in the LTL market
Sustainability gaps in meeting decarbonization and regulatory expectations
controversies: Involvement in legal disputes such as wrongful discharge claims and diversity jurisdiction cases
Challenges in meeting stringent emissions regulations and safety standards
environmental_issues: Limited adoption of emission reduction strategies, with less than 1% of the fleet using alternative vehicles and renewable fuels
social_issues: Labor disputes and driver shortages impacting workforce stability
Recognition as a 'Top Company for Women to Work in Transportation' indicating progress in diversity and inclusion
governance_issues: Increased borrowing capacity raising concerns about leverage and financial stability
